cast.overview: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults), Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.
cast.title: CODA

details.biography: Born in South Boston and Irish through and through. Marilyn is a proud member of SAG-AFTRA and has made her career playing working-class women, chock full of sunshine and laughter - until they burn you with shade. Actress in Best Picture Academy Award Winning film "CODA" with Marlee Matlin and Emilia Jones, directed by Sian Heder. Seen on NBC, Netflix, Showtime, HULU, Apple TV+ and more.
details.name: Marilyn Busch
